title: Create Facebook Marketing Headlines for Amazon Products
original_prompt: Assume yourself as a professional social media marketer having years of experience. You have to write 10 creative facebook posts for the {father's day:father's day} Day {50%:50%} off offer for {power bank:power bank}, in around 30 words.
input1: Celebrate Father's Day with a powerful gift! Enjoy 50% off on our premium power banks. Keep Dad charged and connected all day long. Limited time offer, don’t miss out!
input2: This Father's Day, give Dad the gift of power! Get 50% off our top-rated power banks. Perfect for the dad on the go. Shop now and make his day extra special!
